contentrichtext.text: '''Thomas Holt''' may refer to: *[[Thomas Holt (MP)]] for Canterbury *[[Tom Holt]] (born 1961), author of humorous fantasies and historical fiction *[[Thomas Holt (architect)]] (1578?–1624), English architect *[[Thomas C. Holt]], American writer and historian *[[Thomas Holt (Australian politician)]] (1811–1888), wool merchant, financier and politician *[[Thomas Michael Holt]] (1831–1896), Governor of North Carolina, 1891–1893 *[[Thomas Holt (Serjeant-at-Law)]] (1616–1686), English lawyer and politician ==See also== *[[Thomas Holte]] (1571–1654), English landowner *[[Thomas Holte (died 1546)]], MP {{hndis|Holt, Thomas}}
